title: What does the LVL on the Board Profile Reflect?
body: I was wondering if someone could tell me what the levels on the board profile reflect.

replies.body: LostFr0st has your back!  Let me know if this is still an issue.

It's your in-game level.  It takes making a post to update it though.
(or using the boards profile syncing tool here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/6JI91pva-boards-profile-syncing-tool )

You're showing as level 36 now^^
